column3: $on the popped-up bunt, Gary Carter caught the ball with no call from HP umpire Bruce Froemming; Carter threw to 3B for 'force' and 3B umpire Jerry Crawford signaled 'out' (he said later 'on the batter'); Larry Parrish threw to 1B for another out; Jerry Manuel then ran to 2B and touched the bag to triple off Larry Bowa (called by 2B umpire John Kibler); then Kibler changed his mind and said he called time before the last out; after huddle, the triple play ruled by the umpires then negated by NL President Chub Feeney; 10 minute delay
$Jerry Manuel missed 2B bag on attempted DP
$Tug McGraw allowed popped-up bunt to drop
